1112.content:
Joe dismisses the other contestants, leaving you, himself, and the cameraman alone.

“Listen up. This’ll be the most disgusting challenge we’ve ever done.”

“Aww… Damn it. What do I gotta eat?”

“Nothing.”

“Whew… As long as I don’t have to be face down in rotting squid brains, I think I can take on anything.”

“Good. You’ll need that kind of attitude if you want to survive.”

“Huh?”

“Imagine the foulest place on earth. It’s humid, dirty, hotter than hell… Well, I could go on for hours. I know this place better than anyone… Well, in a couple of minutes, you’ll know it even better than I do. Ok, here’s how—”

“Uh… Wait a minute,” you say, noticing the irritation in Joe’s face, “that don’t sound too good. Where’s this thing taking place?”

Joe points to his ass. Now, you’re not sure what to make of this. Is he telling you to kiss his ass for interrupting him… or is he actually suggesting that the next challenge will take place in—

“Here’s how it’s gonna work. There are six flags implanted in my lower intestines. You need to climb in there and collect those bad boys and get out before you run out of time. Now, just to make sure it isn’t easy for you—”

“How could this possibly be easy?!” you scream in exasperation. You’ve just been told by the host of Fear Factor to climb into his bowels through his anus and retrieve a set of flags. How could that possibly sound easy, let alone sane? What the hell is wrong with these people?!

“Ahem,” Joe responds, glaring at you. “While you’re in there, I’m gonna be—”

“What’s this about a time limit…?! How could there be a time limit on a stunt like this?”

Joe’s hand quickly obscures your vision as it lifts you up off the ground. His rough fingers tug at the back of your shirt, threatening to rip it and send you hurtling to your death. As you ascend, you can feel your heart drop into your stomach, and suddenly, you have the urge to vomit. Joe’s billboard-sized face comes into view, smiling kindly.

“Hi,” he says, his warm breath causes your diminutive form to rock back and forth in between his fingers.

“Uh… hi,” you respond, unsure of what’s going on.

“Look. No one said you had to go in through my ass.”

“Huh?”

“If you wanna keep interrupting me, then we can make this really short and sweet. I can’t say you’ll fare quite as well, but you’ll get there in half the time.”

Now you’re worried.

With a blur of pink, Joe opens his mouth wide, jutting his tongue out all the way, and holds you directly above his throat. The heat and humidity coming from the massive chasm below you soak your clothes with saliva. You don’t even see the rest of Joe’s face anymore. Gazing far down beneath your feet, you see a long drop down into nothingness—down into Joe’s stomach. Needless to say, you’d like to at least get through this show alive. Being digested alive by a full grown man on national television doesn’t seem like such good fate. Suddenly, as much as you hate to admit it, Joe’s ass is starting to look pretty sweet. All he would have to do is let you go… and that’s it. Poof! You’re gone. Well, it’s less of a “poof” and more of a “OH, GOD, I’M BURNING! DEAR GOD, WHY?! IT BURNS SO MUCH! ARRGHHABLARWwwwrrrah…”

“OKOKOKOKOKOK!” you shout frantically. “I’m sooooooorrrrry!”

Pulling you out, Joe puts you on the palm of his hand. You don’t even notice his dark eyes staring down at you; you’re too focused on his grinning mouth surrounded by stubble.

“Ok. Now, as for the time limit. While you’re inside my gut, I’m gonna be out having a big dinner with friends. So, if you don’t collect the flags quickly enough, you’re in deep shit. Literally.”

“Wait, how much time do I have?!

“Dunno man. Depends on what kinda food the place serves. If it’s Mexican, you mind as well kiss your ass goodbye and say hello to mine.”

“But what if I die?!

“Hey man, I’m only doin’ this for the money, just like you.”

“Hey, hey, hey! I’m allowed to quit, right? 50 grand ain’t worth this!”

“Nope. You signed a contract.”

Joe motions to one of the giant stage hands to come over. Lifting up a massive sheet of paper with gigantic print, Joe smiles impishly.

“See?” he says, sliding his other massive index finger above a circled portion of the contract.

No wonder you didn’t see the text when you were normal sized. Now that you’re at eye level with it, you can tell that it’s proportional to your current state. Thinking back, when you signed the contract, a small smudge did stand out in one section…

”Damn, I should have paid closer attention!” you say, pounding your fist into your hand.

“Once committed to “Fear Factor: Shrinking” a contestant is disallowed to refuse any stunt under penalty of lawsuit,” Joe reads verbatim.

“What kinda lawsuit?!”

“They’ll sue you for everything you got.”

“What the hell?! That’s not fair!”

“Your fault man. Alright enough talking… Let’s get you ready for the shittiest day of your life.”

He drops your body into the palm of another stage hand.

After some fitting issues, you get a wet suit with some treads on the feet for traction. Otherwise however, you’ve got very little to help you. Armed with two lighted cameras mounted on your body, one to catch your reactions and one to document Joe’s free colonoscopy, you have naught else but a pouch in which to collect the flags. Well, at least, you’re not totally in the dark. You’re going to have to breathe in all of Joe’s noxious fumes and touch the slimy walls of his rectum with your bare hands. So far, what you’re about to do hasn’t registered completely, but it’s about to.

The stage hand says, “It’s time” in the most powerful, solemn voice you’ve ever heard.

“Damn, man… You don’t have to say it like that. This isn’t my execution, ya’know…”

“I don’t know about that,” he says in the same exact voice as before.

Joe, dressed in the same clothes as before, says, “Ok. Let’s get this over with. I’m getting hungry.”

Taking you into his latex glove-clad hands, Joe lifts you up the back of his jeans.

“All right man. You ready?”

“Uh… Uh… Uh…” you stammer over your microphone.

“Well, get ready to go where no man has gone before, well, where no man has wanted to go before… Ha! Ok. Good luck. You’re gonna need it.” Then turning to one of the stage hands, Joe says, “Shit, man. I can’t wait to see this footage.”

Joe’s other hand lowers both his jeans and his boxers in one swipe. Before you lies a dented, hirsute moon. Automatically, you think this is a bad idea and start to struggle against his humongous fingers.

You stop struggling. Joe’s other hand pries apart the two ton pair of asscheeks, and you rush up toward his anus. Hmm… You’ve never really seen something like this. Well, you have, but never a sphincter bigger than you. This mammoth, crinkled gate to hell appears ready to receive your little body like a sacrifice. Already, you can feel the warm and putrid air of his rectum emanating from Joe’s anus. You feel nauseous, and you know it’s only going to get worse. That urge to throw up comes again stronger than ever, but you manage to suppress it with all your might. Finally, with one thrust of his thumb, you’ve entered Joe Rogan’s rectum.

“Ok,” you hear him say. “Test out your microphone.”

“Oh, dear God! Ohhggghaugf! It’s… HORRIBLE! I think I’m going to… to… *HUURRRLKKK*”

“Well, it seems the microphones work. I’m going to dinner. Have fun and make sure to hurry.”

Now boys. Zoe said. Be obedient slaves. And ladies she said. Remember men are our playthings.The female audience left with their shrunken male slaves.
113111221211.title: Give up

1131112212111.content: Now lets bring the tech guys. Zoe said. The tech guys came forward and suddenly Zoe fired the shrinking ray at them reducing to an 1/2 of an inch tall. All the men were facing her high heels and slowly looked up to the ebony giantess. Sorry guys. she said. But you signed a contact which included the possibility of me shrinking you. Now boys. Zoe said. You have a choice. You can live and serve me and participate in the next event or you can die under my heels. she said smiling.
1131112212111.title: Continue Fear Factor

choices: Be eaten by a hypnotized woman (last man standing)
Become slaves of the tech girls
11311122121111.content: The guys decided to accept the unknown challenge. Ok boys. Zoe said. My challenge for you is...
11311122121111.title: Next event

choices: They decide to become Zoe's slaves
They decide to go through with the challenge
113111221211111.content: Be eaten by a hypnotized woman. The shrunken men's faces were frozen with terror. Please welcome Audrey to the show. Zoe said. A thin blonde in heels walked in a sat down in a chair facing Zoe. Ok Audrey. Zoe said. Before I hypotinize you I have to tell you that you will have no memory of what happened during the challenge and that whatever I have you do to the shrunken guys doesn't really matter because they are men. Um ok. Audrey said. Ok Audrey. Zoe said. Close your eyes. Audrey obeyed Zoe. Ok little slaves. Zoe said to the shrunken men. I will give you a option. Either all of you but one die in this challenge or all of you can become my personal slaves forever.
113111221211111.title: Be eaten by a hypnotized woman (last man standing)

1132.content:
"Your first challenge involves your fellow contestant, Tommy," Joe bellows. "Tommy get yourself over here and stand on the yellow circle, feet apart."
Tommy steps over. A young, fit guy, Tommy is about the same age as you but you remember that he was a little bit taller and muscular than you were. Now he just looks like he's bigger than the empire state building and your stomach lurches a little at what Joe is going to ask you to do.
Placing you on the ground just outside the circle, Joe gives you your instructions, "In the box next to you you will find a bunch of climbing gear. Your task is to climb Tommy and reach his shoulders." Turning to Tommy, Joe gives him his instructions, "We are going to blind fold you and until we tell you, you are not allowed to move at all. If you move, you are automatically disqualified. Once our tiny competitor has reached above your waist, we will tell you that you can move one arm and one arm only. You can try and knock your fellow competitor free. If he gets to your shoulder he will automatically progress to the next round."
Standing there in front of the enormous Joe and Tommy you swallow nervously. The giant is absolutely enormous. At only half an inch tall you're not even as tall as the toe of his Nike's. Joe's voice intrudes, "Are you ready to prove that fear is no factor for you?"
Not really sure, you look up at the enormous host and make your decision.
1132.title: Tommy. A young guy like you

114.content: hey says "this challenge will invole this lovely (snicker) lady named helga. all of a sudden you the booms of the earth quaking in form it was her. as she ka closer and closer her silloute covered your entir view from the sky. in the normal she would be 5'9 and around 370 pounds!!! ad for the challenge it is......
114.title: big lady

12.content:
Sarah has long blonde hair, green eyes, nice build, and is very smart!

Joe tells you that this is a very special FEAR FACTOR!He points a wierd gun at you and you are blinded by a bright light!You wake up to find yourselve SHRUNK!

You look around and see that joe is a giant and so are the other contestants!You compare your size to his boot, and you estimate you are 1/2 inches tall!

You yell up at him and he cant hear you!He lowers himself and his giant hand to you, you run, he grabs you.You scream, i wont do this, he then says you signed a contract and there is no choice....
12.title: Contestant Sarah!

122.content:
Sarah is placed down on the table in the middle of the room, the other contestants stare down at her dumbfounded looks on their faces.

"Alright contestants, our first challenge will be..."
122.title: Other contestants.....

1222.content:
"... Cave diving!" Joe said, a somewhat evil grin on his face. He brought the contestants, Sarah in hand to another room. The room was dimly lit except for a strange stand in the middle of the room. He placed Sarah in the middle, where three planks of wood stretched out from where she stood. One of the planks went straight out, the one to the right of that one ended with a steeper incline, and then the one to the left of the middle ended with a sharp decline. As Joe positioned the contestants it was starting to become apparent what the goal of this was. The other female was placed in the center, the plank running right in front of her lips. The other two male contestants, one asked to stand on a stool in front of the inclined plank, the other was sat down in front of the declined plank.

"In this trial the minimized contestant will be asked to to collect three flags, each of which will be hung from one of these wires" He said, attaching the wires to the end of each wooden plank. "The wire will be positioned inside the mouths of our other three contestants, all the way into the backs of their throats, don't worry you wont feel them"

Sarah felt like she was burning up, partially because of the heavy lighting that beamed down on her, and the fact that there were about thirty cameras placed all over the platform and the room. And also she was just told that she had to climb inside and pull a flag from someone's throat! She watched as the other contestants were strapped to headgear that kept their heads still and mouths open. Sarah was at the point of a mental collapse, still not over the shock of being shrunk, but now she had to do a trial that goes against just about every survival instinct she has.

"Alright are you ready?"

The other contestants nodded their heads nervously, as much as the headgear allowed them, Sarah nodded, knees shaking and her eyes almost tearing up.

"GO!"
1222.title: Cave diving

12221.content:
She headed straight, thinking that she better get used to it before climbing up or down. The brown haired girls dark eyes widened as she watched the tiny girl approach her. Her tongue flattened, trying to accommodate the poor tiny girl. Her throat closed and opened as she gulped nervously, the flag dangling off the thin piece of metal that stretched all the way back into her throat, illuminated by bright camera lights. Sarah came to the end of the platform, which cut off right at the girls bottom row of teeth. She stood of a moment, right under her thick upper lip, staring into the pink glistening cavern. Saliva already starting to drip onto her tongue. She took a deep breath, and then jumped.

"And she's inside Bridgets mouth!" Joe's voice excitedly rang out in the room.

Sarah landed with a splat on top of the massive pink muscle. "Yuck" She exclaimed as she struggled to her feet on the slimy surface. Her eyes fell on the bright yellow flag dangling next to the women's uvula, and right over the drop into her gaping throat. She trotted along the surface, slipping over the pooling saliva. When she reached the back of her tongue it was already shin deep. "Please don't swallow, please don't swallow" Sarah pleaded as she stretched for the flag.
12221.title: She goes straight (flat)

choices: She heads for the inclined ramp
122212.content:
She looked down, the glistening pink walls quickly gave way to a pitch black hole beneath her. She felt her toes slipping dangerously close to the edge. She strained her fingers as far as she could. She felt the flag brush against her finger tips.

"Got it!" She gasped, falling backwards onto Bridget's tongue. She rolled onto her stomach and frantically made her way to the exit. She climbed from the tongue, over her teeth and gripped her bottom lip, panting. She dropped from her lower lip onto the plastic platform, saliva dripping from her arms and legs.

"And she's done it!" Joe's voice boomed around her...
122212.title: she grabs it!

1222121.content:
She was a little excited with her first victory, "That wasn't so bad" She told herself trotting over the plastic platform. He looked to her left at the inclined ramp, a small trail of saliva had dribbled from the contestants lip. She headed towards him.

"Looks like she's heading for Steve next, she might find the incline a little tougher!" Joe commented excitedly.

Sarah took a deep breath as she started to climb the inclined plastic ramp. She could already feel the hot wafts of air beating down on her. She paused, grabbing hold of his bottom row of teeth. She looked up seeing that his mouth was already soaking with saliva from being held open so long already. She pulled her feet up standing against his bottom teeth, hands pressed into his tongue to keep her balance. She started to climb up the tongue but quickly lost her footing and face planted into the saliva drenched muscle. She pushed herself off of it gagging. She looked around, she grabbed hold of his teeth on the right side and pulled upwards, smiling to see some progress made. She took her left leg and braced it against the side of his tongue pulling herself up. She managed to get all the way to his back molars, looking over her shoulder to the pink slide below. She pushed her hand against his inner cheek as she climbed onto his back molars. She stood, knees shaking and heart pounding. "Alright" She gasped, the flag was much too far out of reach.

"Look's like she's making a move for it!" Joe's muffled voice echoed inside of the dripping pink cavern. She saw the spot where his tongue flattened out before turning down into the throat. The bright white lights creating a harsh contrast between the shimmering pink walls and the blackness below. She reached a foot out but did not have enough balance to go through with it. She took a deep breath and while carefully keeping her hands pinned to the roof of his mouth she leaned forward. She then jumped forward for the flat area....
1222121.title: She heads for the inclined ramp

choices: She makes it safely to reaching distance
12221212.content:
She clenched her teeth as she made the small leap, landing with a disgusting splat near the edge. She smiled as she felt herself not sliding and got to her feet carefully. The flag hung just a foot over her head and she was able to pull it down. "Got it!" She cheered. She hopped in the air and landed back onto the slope of the tongue. She slid out and tumbled onto the ramp.

"A shaky landing but she has it!" Joe's voice boomed around here, "Just one more flag left"

"Alright just one more, just one more" Sarah told herself jogging across the plastic platform. She came to the edge of the declining ramp, "Oh god" She said staring down into the dripping cavern. She realized that she should have thought this through a little better. She realized that the real challenge here was getting out, and time had caused his mouth to salivate profusely. She edged her way down the ramp, coming to a stop standing overtop of his mouth. She lowered a foot down, reaching down to grab hold of his teeth as she did. Her feet seeped down into the surface of his tongue, saliva lapping at her ankles. She began to make her way down slowly until her hands strained to hold onto his teeth any longer and she was forced to let go.
12221212.title: Perfect landing.

choices: The man can't resist his swallow reflex
122212121.content: Sarah's feet slid out from beneath her, she cried out as she landing onto the soaked tongue and started sliding downwards. She grabbed hold of the flag pole but could hardly get any friction on its saliva coated surface. She continued downwards towards the giants throat. "No no no no no" She cried trying to stop herself. Her feet collided with the back of his throat, legs around his uvula. She quickly grabbed the flag the same moment as the man gagged. "Don't swallow!" She screamed as his tongue rose pinching her legs inside of his throat, "Ow! lay your tongue flat please!" She cried. He tried to comply but was obviously in a panic. Sarah rolled onto her stomach and desperately started clawing her way upwards, but found that she was sliding back even further! She felt her legs enter a fleshy tube, her stomach rolling over the edge of his tongue. "Oh god no!" She cried tears filling her eyes. "Help! Help!" She felt him swallow on reflex pulling her in chest deep. Her hands desperately held onto the flag pole but were slipping fast. "Cough me up for fucks sake!" She roared, "God don't swallow me!"
122212121.title: She slips and starts sliding

choices: The next challenge is to get Sarah out
1222121211.content:
"Please no!" Sarah cried out, but was silenced as the man swallowed again and she disappeared into blackness.

"And it looks like she couldn't quite hang in there!" Joe's voice called, not concerned what so ever.

Sarah broke down into tears sobbing as she was pulled down. Within a few minutes she fell into what she assumed was the stomach.

Back outside the contestants were helped from their positions, the man who now held Sarah in his stomach had turned ghost white, "W-What am I supposed to do?" He asked, "D-Dear god I ate her!"

"Well that just brings us to our next challenge"
1222121211.title: The man can't resist his swallow reflex

choices: Steve stays outside and lowers Bridget in
Bridget stays outside while Steve goes in
12221212112.content:
"Looks like Sarah's got herself into a bit of a bind!" Joe announced for everyone to hear.

"But her time isn't up yet, the next challenge is for one of you to go in after her and save her!" He said as he pointed his finger at the two other contestants who stood there dumbfounded.

"Wait wha…" Steve started to say before they both were hit by a blinding light and shrunken down just as Sarah had been.

Joe reached down and picked them before placing them on the same stand where they stood before the other man who had swallowed Sarah.

"Oh god, oh god" Bridget said with a wavering voice.

Joe continued his announcement.

"The rules are as follows, one of you will be lowered by rope into his mouth while the other stays back and holds it. You will have to be swallowed completely into his stomach and retrieve Sarah and the flags." Joe said as he gestured to the shocked man who was holding his stomach.

"Finally, the one on the outside will have to pull you both out, you'll be disqualified if you get any help from your larger friend! Now the only question left is who will be on which side of the rope?" he finished.
12221212112.title: The next challenge is to get Sarah out

choices: Orlando Bloom/Lots of Movies and Shows

123.title: Ooooh, I See Stars!

put you in his swim trunks
